name: VNFaceLandmarkRegion2D
desc: 2D geometry information for a specific facial feature.

items.name: var normalizedPoints: [CGPoint]
items.desc: The array of normalized landmark points.

items.name: var precisionEstimatesPerPoint: [Float]?
items.desc: Requests an array of precision estimates for each landmark point.

items.name: func pointsInImage(imageSize: CGSize) -> [CGPoint]
items.desc: An array containing landmark points in the coordinate space of the specified image size.
